_comment: Created by ianb on 08/06/2015 16:33:09 using v2.6
title: How did patients feel about how good GPs and nurses were at giving them enough time?
analysis_commentary: During their appointment with either a GP or nurse the majority of patients (greater than 80%) surveyed in last full financial year data was collected (2012/13) said that they were good at giving them enough time, which is not very different from the proportions of patients that felt the same way in the proceeding 3 years or subsequent time periods. Also more patients consistently thought GPs were good at giving them enough time compared to nurses.
